column2: "Iyi ekyir no so Ahithofel see Absalom dɛ
column3: Afei ma mensan mu nyi mbarimba mpemduebien
column4: na monsoɛr nketsiw David anadwe yi:"

column2: "na monkɔ no do aber a ɔaberɛ na ne nsamu agow yi
column3: na minkeyi no hu: na dɔm a wɔka no ho nyinara boguan; na muboku ɔhen no nko:"

column2: "na memfa dɔm no nyinara nsan mbrɛ wo
column3: dɛ mbrɛ ayefor kɔ no kun nkyɛn no: na nyimpa kor pɛr na erohwehwɛ no eku no: na ɔman no nyinara bɛyɛ komm."

column2: "Na asɛm no sɔɔ Absalom
column3: na Israel mpanyimfo no nyinara enyi papaara."

column2: "Nna Absalom see dɛ
column3: Afei wɔmfrɛ Husai
column5: na wɔmma yentsie dza ɔno so wɔ ka."

column2: "Na aber a Husai baa Absalom nkyɛn no
column3: Absalom kaa kyerɛɛ no dɛ
column4: Mbrɛ Ahithofel aka nye yi: ana yendzi n’asɛm no do a? Sɛ oho a

column2: "Na Husai see Absalom dɛ
column3: Apam a Ahithofel dze ama aber yi dze onnye."

column2: "Nkyii so Husai see dɛ
column3: Ɔwoara nyim w’egya na ne mbarimba
column5: na hɔn enyi aber dɛ osisi a woewia ne mba wɔ haban mu: na w’egya so yɛ ɔsabarimba

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: sisei oekosuma noho wɔ mona bi mu
column4: anaa beebi: na ɔbɛba dɛ sɛ hɔn mu binom totɔr asɔpɔn no a
column5: obiara a ɔbɛtse no bɛse dɛ
column6: Ɔkogu esi nkorɔfo a wodzi Absalom ekyir no mu."

column2: "Na nyia ɔyɛ ndam a n’akoma tse dɛ gyata akoma no mpo
column3: ɔbɛnan koraa: osiandɛ Israel nyinara nyim dɛ w’egya yɛ ɔbarimba katakyi
column4: na hɔn a wɔwɔ ne nkyɛn no wɔyɛ mbarimba a wɔyɛ ndam."

column2: "Mbom mususu dɛ wɔmboaboa Israel nyinara ano wɔ wo nkyɛn
column3: ofi Dan araa dze kodu Beer-seba
column4: dɛ mpoano anhwea wɔ dodow mu; na wankasa kɔ akono."

column2: "Nna yebopue no do wɔ beebiara mbrɛ wobohu no
column3: na yeedwir no do dɛ mbrɛ ɔbɔsu tɔ gu famu: yerinngyaa mma ɔno na mbarimba a wɔka no ho mu baako mpo mma nnka."

column2: "Nkyii so ɔtwe noho kɔ kurow bi mu a
column3: ɔno Israel nyinara dze ntampee bɛba kurow no ho
column4: na yɛatwe no akɔ esutsen mu ma ekodu dɛ worunnhu ɔbo kakraba kor mpo wɔ hɔ."

column2: "Na Absalom na Israel mbarimba no nyinara see dɛ
column3: Husai
column5: n’apam no ye sen Ahithofel n’apam no. Na EWURADZE na ɔahyehyɛ dɛ ɔbɛsɛɛ Ahithofel n’apam papa no
column6: ama EWURADZE dze mbusu aaba Absalom do."

column2: "Nna Husai see asɔfo Zadok na Abiathar dɛ
column3: Dɛm na dɛm na Ahithofel dze apam Absalom na Israel mpanyimfo no: na dɛm na dɛm na mo so mapam."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei hom nsoma ntsɛm
column3: ma wɔnkɛka nkyerɛ David
column5: Mma nntsena sar no do nsutwaree hɔ anadwe yi
column6: na otwa ara na twa kɔ; ɔno bɛyɛ na wɔabɛmen ɔhen
column7: na nkorɔfo a wɔka no ho no nyinara."

column2: "Afei Jonatan na Ahimaaz tsenaa En-rogel ho; na abaawa bi na ɔtɔ dɛ ɔkɛka kyerɛ hɔn; na hɔn so wosi mu kɔ kɛka kyerɛ ɔhen David; osiandɛ nna onnyi dɛ wohu hɔn dɛ wɔaba kurow no mu."
"Na abanyimbasiaba bi kohun hɔn
column3: na ɔkɛkaa kyerɛɛ Absalom: ntsi hɔn beenu nyina guaan ntsɛmara kɔree
column4: na wokodur ɔbarimba bi fie wɔ Bahurim
column5: nna ɔwɔ bura bi wɔ ne paado; na wosiaan mu."

column2: "Na ɔbaa no a ɔwɔ fie hɔ no faa nkataano no na ɔtserɛɛw mu kataa bura no ano
column3: na ɔdze eburow siwii tserɛtserɛɛw do: na obiara ennhu ho hwee."

column2: "Na Absalom no nkowaa no baa ɔbaa no nkyɛn wɔ fie hɔ; na wɔsee dɛ
column3: Hen na Ahimaaz na Jonatan wɔwɔ? Na ɔbaa no see hɔn dɛ
column4: Woetwa ɔwora no kɔ. Na wɔhwehwɛɛ hɔn na woennhu hɔn no

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: wɔkɔree no ekyir no
column5: na wosii mu kɔree kɛkaa kyerɛɛ ɔhen David; na wɔsee David dɛ
column7: na wonkotwa nsu no ntsɛm: na dɛm na Ahithofel apam etsia hom."

column2: "Nna David
column3: na nkorɔfo a wɔka no ho no nyinara soɛree
column4: na wokotwaa Jordan: na anapa enyimtsetsewee no na hɔn mu baako mpo nnkae a onnyae nnkotwaa Jordan."

column2: "Aber a Ahithofel hun dɛ wɔammfa n’apam do no
column3: ɔhyehyɛɛ n’asoaso
column4: na ɔsoɛree kɔr fie wɔ no kurow mu na ɔtotoo ne fie yie
column5: na ɔkɛsɛɛn ne men; na owui
column6: na wosiee no wɔ n’egya n’asamandan mu."

column2: "Nna David baa Mahanaim. Na Absalom kotwaa Jordan
column3: ɔnoara na Israel mbarimba a wɔka no ho no nyinara."

column2: "Na Absalom dze Amasa hyɛɛ Joab n’ananmu wɔ dɔm no do. Amasa yi yɛ Israelnyi ɔbarimba bi a ne dzin dze Itra ne ba
column3: na ne na nye Nahas ne babaa Abigail
column4: Joab ne na Zeruia no nua no."

column2: "Na Israel na Absalom kɛkyeer nsera wɔ Gilead asaase do."
"Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a David baa Mahanaim no
column5: Nahas ne ba a ofi Ammonmba Rabaa no
column7: Ammiel ne ba a ofi Lo-debar
